title: The MKULTRA Conspiracy
description: by John Lisle Project Mind Control‘s John Lisle explains how something as classified as MKULTRA naturally attracts conspiracy theorists, and how the theories all began. Few topics have caused more distrust in government than MKULTRA, the CIA’s secret project to develop methods of mind control. Throughout the 1950s and 60s, MKULTRA scientists subjected psychiatric patients […] The post The MKULTRA Conspiracy appeared first on The History Reader.
author: Sara Eslami
